levels.description: Immediately launches a traction hook that <$ba.root><@ba.vup>Binds</></> its target, then deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as <@ba.vup>Physical damage</> to the target and drags it towards this unit <@ba.vup>slightly</> every 1.5 seconds until this skill ends
